column4: My god.. Totem truely really sucks! It won't even let me setup deinterlacing options for the xine engine? Egawds man! What happened to gnome?
use whatever suits your needs. I use mplayer and beep-media-player
Yeah. I know. I was just wanting to see where gnome has gone throughout the years I haven't used even Linux. And quite frankly, I'm very displeased with gnome.
me and Linus too
but we don'g wanna start that in here :)
did you read this http://mail.gnome.org/archives/usability/2005-December/msg00021.html ?
Wow...
I'm quite pleased to read those words, coming from Linus himself. "Please, just tell people to use KDE."
He's always liked statements with an attitude though :|
Heh. He's a very blunt man. Kinda makes me wonder if he's a Capricorn like myself. :)
only if thing is using gstreamer
Personally I gave up on gstreamer for now because it's not integrated very well with kde apps by now
I despise gstreamer, so far. It's horrible. IMHO of course. :)
Actually it looks like a very promising api. kde is going to switch to using it as well I read somewhere
but it's annoying when it doen't work
which is all the time for me
Yeah. Heh.. Ditto for me, so far, too.
kde?
Oh.. No, gstreamer. KDE works perfectly for me.
yeah
i mean are you using it in kde
scary aint it? :)
konversation is better. irssi beats them all though :)
